title: France panorama. [No. 70/40]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. The temptation salon - Paris’ 50th Jewelry, Gem and Silversmith Salon recently transformed the Porte de Versailles Exhibition Hall into a real Ali Baba’s cave. 2. Modern architecture and Claude Parent - a search for harmony in life. 3. The 1970 woman as seen by Cardin - winter fashions. 4. The French provincial cities - Rouen.
